titleStmt.title: The heads of severall petitions delivered by many of the troopers against the Lord General and some other officers of the army. With the answer which Mr. Pym made to the severall heads or petitions, before the committee on Tuesday, October 5. 1641.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
